short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist Chrome extension to control suggested and sponsored posts in your feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Feed Cleaner is a minimalist Chrome extension that allows you to control the visibility of suggested & sponsored posts in your LinkedIn feed.
